00005 package Parser::List::List;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::List);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  The basic List class does it all.  We only need this class
00011 #  for its name.
00012 #
00013 
00014 #
00015 #  Produce a string version with extra space
00016 #
00017 sub string {
00018   my $self = shift; my $precedence = shift; my @coords = ();
00019   my $def = $self->context->{lists}{$self->type};
00020   my $separator = $def->{separator}; $separator = ", " unless defined $separator;
00021   foreach my $x (@{$self->{coords}}) {push(@coords,$x->string)}
00022   return $self->{open}.join($separator,@coords).$self->{close};
00023 }
